mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pallet_transport_system.order WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pallet_transport_system.order(order_id, user_id, tray_id, src, dst, priority, car_id, is_deleted, is_finished, created) values(#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{trayId}, #{src}, #{dst}, #{priority}, null, false, false, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE pallet_transport_system.order SET is_deleted = true WHERE order_id=#{orderId};
UPDATE pallet_transport_system.order SET is_finished = true WHERE order_id=#{orderId};
